text: The Qatar Bahrain Causeway (also called the Qatar Bahrain Friendship Bridge) is a planned causeway between the two Arab states of Qatar and Bahrain. It was announced on 13 December 2008 that construction would start in early 2009."Work on Qatar-Bahrain causeway to start next month" As of November 2010, construction had not started."Qatar-Bahrain Causeway on hold" On 27 April 2011, an announcement was made that building the causeway would start in 2011 for completion in 2015. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Qatar Category:Buildings and structures in Bahrain Category:Transport in Qatar Category:Bridges in Asia
title: Qatar Bahrain Causeway
